name: Orc Hand of Yurtrus
languages: understands Common and Orc but can't speak

traits.name: Aggressive
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the orc can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.desc: The orc is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). It requires no verbal components to cast its spells. The orc has the following cleric spells prepared: * Cantrips (at-will): guidance, mending, resistance, thaumaturgy * 1st level (4 slots): bane, detect magic, inflict wounds, protection from evil and good * 2nd level (3 slots): blindness/deafness, silence

actions.name: Touch of the White Hand
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d8) necrotic damage.
